code: import React from'react';import{useRef,useEffect}from'react';import'./Map.css';var Map=function Map(props){var mapRef=useRef();var center=props.center,zoom=props.zoom;useEffect(function(){var map=new window.google.maps.Map(mapRef.current,{center:center,zoom:zoom});new window.google.maps.Marker({position:props.center,map:map});},[center,zoom]);return React.createElement("div",{ref:mapRef,className:"map ".concat(props.className," style = {props.style}")});};export default Map;
